languages.text: Клан одной из макропушек бьет тревогу: вентиляционные системы отсека принесли миазмы жуткой болезни, которая ежеминутно косит десятки людей. Ужаснее всего то, что мертвецы поднимаются на ноги и нападают на живых, а некоторые трупы и вовсе теряют человечий облик, превращаясь в кошмарных варп-тварей. Отправлять в отсек отряды подобно самоубийству — только бесстрашн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан и {mf|его|ее} свита может остановить эту напасть!

One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!
languages.original_text: Клан одной из макропушек бьет тревогу: вентиляционные системы отсека принесли миазмы жуткой болезни, которая ежеминутно косит десятки людей. Ужаснее всего то, что мертвецы поднимаются на ноги и нападают на живых, а некоторые трупы и вовсе теряют человечий облик, превращаясь в кошмарных варп-тварей. Отправлять в отсек отряды подобно самоубийству — только бесстрашн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан и {mf|его|ее} свита может остановить эту напасть!

traits.locale_text: One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!

One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!

One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!

languages.text: 宏炮甲板的某个氏族敲响了警报。某种带有可怕疾病的瘴气顺着通风系统渗入了甲板，每分钟都有几十个人死亡。更可怕的是，那些病死的人又站了起来，袭击活人。还有一部分尸体完全失去了人类的样子，扭曲成了无法言喻的亚空间野兽。对于普通士兵来说，冲进这层甲板无异于自杀，只有无畏的领主舰长和{mf|他的|她的}随行人员才能解决这场危机！
languages.original_text: One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!

traits.locale_text: 宏炮甲板的某个氏族敲响了警报。某种带有可怕疾病的瘴气顺着通风系统渗入了甲板，每分钟都有几十个人死亡。更可怕的是，那些病死的人又站了起来，袭击活人。还有一部分尸体完全失去了人类的样子，扭曲成了无法言喻的亚空间野兽。对于普通士兵来说，冲进这层甲板无异于自杀，只有无畏的领主舰长和{mf|他的|她的}随行人员才能解决这场危机！

languages.text: Uno de los clanes de macrocañones ha dado la voz de alarma: los sistemas de ventilación de la bodega han traído los miasmas de una terrible enfermedad que está matando a docenas por minuto. Y lo que es más horrible, los muertos se levantan y atacan a los vivos, mientras que algunos cadáveres pierden por completo su forma humana y se convierten en bestias de la disformidad indescriptibles. Sería un suicidio que las tropas asaltaran la bodega. ¡Solo {mf|el|la} valiente Lord Capitán y su séquito pueden detener esta terrible situación!
languages.original_text: One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!

traits.locale_text: Uno de los clanes de macrocañones ha dado la voz de alarma: los sistemas de ventilación de la bodega han traído los miasmas de una terrible enfermedad que está matando a docenas por minuto. Y lo que es más horrible, los muertos se levantan y atacan a los vivos, mientras que algunos cadáveres pierden por completo su forma humana y se convierten en bestias de la disformidad indescriptibles. Sería un suicidio que las tropas asaltaran la bodega. ¡Solo {mf|el|la} valiente Lord Capitán y su séquito pueden detener esta terrible situación!

languages.text: マクロキャノンの一族のひとつが警報を鳴らした。ベイの換気システムからひどい病の瘴気が届いて、毎分数十人の命を奪っている。さらに恐ろしいことに、死者は自らの足で立って生きている者を襲い、一部の死体は人間の形からすっかり離れて、言い知れぬ<歪み>の獣に変わってしまっている。軍隊がベイを襲撃するのは自殺行為だ ― この窮地を救うことができるのは、恐れ知らずのロード・キャプテンとその従者しかいない！
languages.original_text: One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!

traits.locale_text: マクロキャノンの一族のひとつが警報を鳴らした。ベイの換気システムからひどい病の瘴気が届いて、毎分数十人の命を奪っている。さらに恐ろしいことに、死者は自らの足で立って生きている者を襲い、一部の死体は人間の形からすっかり離れて、言い知れぬ<歪み>の獣に変わってしまっている。軍隊がベイを襲撃するのは自殺行為だ ― この窮地を救うことができるのは、恐れ知らずのロード・キャプテンとその従者しかいない！

languages.text: Un des clans du macro-canon a sonné l'alarme : les miasmes d'une terrible maladie se propagent dans les conduits de ventilation et tuent des dizaines de personnes à un rythme plus qu'inquiétant. Mais il y a pire : les cadavres se relèvent et attaquent les survivants, tandis que d'autres perdent leur forme humaine et se transforment en effroyables monstruosités du Warp. Les troupes n'ont aucune chance de prendre la baie d'assaut, et {mf|seul le seigneur-capitaine|seule la seigneure-capitaine} est désormais capable de repousser ce fléau !
languages.original_text: One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!

Mais il y a pire : les cadavres se relèvent et attaquent les survivants, tandis que d'autres perdent leur forme humaine et se transforment en effroyables monstruosités du Warp. Les troupes n'ont aucune chance de prendre la baie d'assaut, et {mf|seul le seigneur-capitaine|seule la seigneure-capitaine} est désormais capable de repousser ce fléau !

languages.text: Einer der Makrokanonen-Clans hat Alarm ausgelöst: Die Lüftungssysteme der Bucht haben das Miasma einer grauenhaften Krankheit hineingebracht, die jede Minute Dutzende von Todesopfern fordert. Schlimmer noch: Die Toten erheben sich wieder und greifen die Lebenden an. Einige der Leichen verlieren ihre menschliche Gestalt vollständig und verwandeln sich in unaussprechliche Warpmonster. Es wäre Selbstmord, wenn die Truppen die Bucht stürmen. Nur der furchtlose Lord Captain und {mf|sein|ihr} Gefolge können dieser Seuche ein Ende bereiten!
languages.original_text: One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!

languages.text: Makro top klanlarından biri alarm verdi: Bölmenin havalandırma sistemleri, dakikalar içinde onlarca kişinin ölümüne neden olan korkunç bir hastalığın dumanlarını taşıdı. Daha da dehşet verici olan ise ölülerin ayağa kalkıp yaşayanlara saldırması ve bazı cesetlerin tamamen insan biçimlerini yitirerek tarif edilemez öteboyut yaratıklarına dönüşmesi. Askerlerin bölmeye girmesi intihar olur. Bu felaketi bir tek korkusuz Lord Kaptan ve maiyeti durdurabilir!
languages.original_text: One of the macro-cannon clans has sounded the alarm: the bay's ventilation systems have brought in the miasmas of some terrible disease that is killing dozens by the minute. Even more horrifying, the dead are rising to their feet and attacking the living while some of the corpses are losing their human forms altogether, turning into unspeakable warp beasts. It would be suicide for the troops to storm the bay — only the fearless Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} retinue can stop this plight!
